title: "Visites d'atelier - Studio visits"
img_alt: Artist Portrait Seiji Kimoto, book series Studio Visits by Paul Bertemes
unterschrift: "Visites d'Atelier - Studio visits", Paul Bertemes and Jean Colling
intro_text: "Visites d'atelier - studio visits" by Paul and Jean Colling Bertemes is the first volume of the "Collection Mediart" book series. It was published in 2006 and features among others an artist portrait of Seiji Kimoto. The series is giving an overview of the art scene in Luxembourg and neighboring regions, by portraing artists renowned across borders in loosely coupled studio visits.
